articles.description: With the arrival of the 2023 NFL Draft, Patriots fans are wondering how their team can make the most of their selections and get their team to the next level.
articles.content: What is this obsession everyone has with the arm length of offensive tackles? Is it really that critical? If so, why? Does anyone know what the arm length was of some of the great tackles of the past… [+4546 chars]
